title: with Brett Salkeld: Conspiracy Thinking, Reciprocal Narrowing, Critical Theory
description:
Brett noticed on social media that friends and church members were not only falling victim to cheap conspiracy theories but also propagating them. He wanted to talk about the patterns of conspiracy theories and I wanted to broaden it to my broader topics of religion, thinking in community, narratives and the church. We had a great conversation. 

Brett's Article https://churchlifejournal.nd.edu/articles/catholic-creationism-as-a-conspiracy-theory/

Suspicious minds, Why we Believe Conspiracy Theories https://amzn.to/36gj5FY

Awakening from the Meaning Crisis Vervaeke Episode 13 https://youtu.be/vGB8k7jk1AQ

Brett Salkeld Transubstantiation https://amzn.to/36fhAYt

Neil Shenvi Critical Theory as Conspiracy Theory https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1262403206560321536.html
